subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: In the last game before the All-Star break, the Knicks lost to Toronto with too many missed layups, 3-pointers and free throws in the final three minutes. The sellout crowd grew increasingly annoyed, groaning and booing every mistake.
snippet: In the last game before the All-Star break, the Knicks lost to Toronto with too many missed layups, 3-pointers and free throws in the final three minutes. The sellout crowd grew increasingly annoyed, groaning and booing every mistake.
